backup.md.Jeedom offre la possibilité d'être sauve: Jeedom offers the possibility of being saved and restored from or from different locations
backup.md.Cette page permet la gestion des sauvega: This page allows the management of backups, restores
backup.md.Vous y trouvez, à gauche, les paramètres: You will find, on the left, the parameters and action buttons
backup.md.Sur la droite, c'est le statut en temps: On the right is the real-time status of the action in progress (backup or restore), if you have launched one
backup.md.Permet de lancer une sauvegarde manuelle: Allows you to start a backup manually and immediately (useful if you want to make a critical change
backup.md.Cela vous permettra de revenir en arrièr: This will allow you to go back
backup.md.Vous avez aussi un bouton pour lancer un: You also have a button to launch a backup without sending the archive to the cloud (requires a subscription see below
backup.md.L'envoi d'une sauvegarde sur le cloud pe: Sending a backup to the cloud can take a while
backup.md.Cette option permet donc d'éviter une pe: This option therefore avoids excessive loss of time
backup.md.Indique le dossier dans lequel Jeedom co: Indicates the folder in which Jeedom copies the backups
backup.md.Il est recommandé de ne pas le changer: It is recommended not to change it
backup.md.Si vous êtes en chemin relatif, son orig: If you are on a relative path, its origin is where Jeedom is installed
backup.md.Nombre de jour(s) de mémorisation des sa: Number of day (s) of storage of backups
backup.md.Nombre de jours de sauvegarde à garder: Number of backup days to keep
backup.md.Une fois ce délai passé, les sauvegardes: Once this period has passed, the backups will be deleted
backup.md.Attention de ne pas mettre un nombre de: Be careful not to put too many days, otherwise your file system may be saturated
backup.md.Permet de limiter la place prise par l'e: Limits the space taken by all backups in the backup folder
backup.md.Si cette valeur est dépassée, Jeedom va: If this value is exceeded, Jeedom will delete the oldest backups until it drops below the maximum size
backup.md.Il gardera cependant au moins une sauveg: It will however keep at least one backup
backup.md.Lance la restauration de la sauvegarde s: Launches the restoration of the backup selected above
backup.md.Supprime la sauvegarde sélectionnée au-d: Delete the backup selected above, only in the local folder
backup.md.Permet d'envoyer dans le dossier des sau: Allows you to send an archive located on the computer you are currently using to the backups folder (for example, restoring an archive previously recovered on a new Jeedom or reinstalling
backup.md.Permet de télécharger sur votre ordinate: Download the archive of the backup selected above to your computer
backup.md.Indique à Jeedom d'envoyer les sauvegard: Tell Jeedom to send backups to the Market cloud, please note that you must have subscribed
backup.md.Permet d'envoyer sur le cloud une archiv: Send a backup archive located on your computer to the cloud
backup.md.Indique à Jeedom d'envoyer les sauvegard: Tells Jeedom to send the backups to the samba share configured here Settings → System → Configuration
backup.md.Lance la restauration de la sauvegarde s: Starts restoring the samba backup selected above
backup.md.Les backups de jeedom doivent être enreg: Jeedom backups must be saved absolutely in a folder only for him
backup.md.Il supprimera tous ce qui n'est pas un b: It will delete everything that is not a jeedom backup from the folder
backup.md.Lors d'une sauvegarde, Jeedom va sauvega: During a backup, Jeedom will backup all of its files and the database
backup.md.Cela contient donc toute votre configura: This therefore contains all of your configuration (equipment, controls, history, scenarios, design, etc
backup.md.Au niveau des protocoles, seul le Z-Wave: At the protocol level, only the Z-Wave (OpenZwave) is a little different because it is not possible to save the inclusions
backup.md.Celles-ci sont directement incluses dans: These are directly included in the controller, so you must keep the same controller to find its Zwave modules
backup.md.Le système sur lequel est installé Jeedo: The system on which Jeedom is installed is not backed up
backup.md.Si vous avez modifié des paramètres de c: If you have changed settings for this system (including via SSH), it's up to you to find a way to recover them if you have any concerns
backup.md.De même les dependances ne le sont pas n: Similarly, the outbuildings are not either, so you will have to reinstall them after a restoration
backup.md.La sauvegarde dans le cloud permet à Jee: Cloud backup allows Jeedom to send your backups directly to the Market
backup.md.Cela vous permet de les restaurer facile: This allows you to restore them easily and be sure not to lose them
backup.md.Le Market conserve les 6 dernières sauve: The Market keeps the last 6 backups
backup.md.Pour vous abonner il suffit d'aller sur: To subscribe just go to your page
backup.md.sur le Market, puis, dans l'onglet: on the Market, then in the tab
backup.md.Vous pouvez, à partir de cette page, réc: You can, from this page, retrieve a backup or buy a subscription (for 1, 3, 6 or 12 months
backup.md.Vous pouvez personnaliser le nom des fic: You can customize the name of the backup files from the tab
backup.md.Jeedom effectue une sauvegarde automatiq: Jeedom performs an automatic backup every day at the same time
backup.md.Il est possible de modifier celle-ci, à: It is possible to modify it, from the "Task engine" (the task is named
backup.md.En effet, elle est calculée par rapport: Indeed, it is calculated in relation to the load of the Market

history.md.la partie historisation, véritable mémoi: the historization part, a true memory of it
history.md.Il est possible dans Jeedom d'historiser: It is possible in Jeedom to log any information type command (binary or digital

history.md.Les réglages par défaut conviennent dans: Default settings are fine in most cases
history.md.L'archivage de données permet à Jeedom d: Data archiving allows Jeedom to reduce the amount of data stored in memory
history.md.Cela permet de ne pas utiliser trop de p: This allows not to use too much space and does not slow down the system
history.md.En effet, si vous conservez toutes les m: Indeed, if you keep all the measurements, this makes all the more points to display and therefore it can considerably lengthen the times to render a graph
history.md.En cas d'un nombre trop important de poi: If there are too many points, it may even cause the graph display to crash
history.md.L'archivage est une tâche qui se lance d: Archiving is a task that starts at night and compacts the data recovered during the day
history.md.Par défaut Jeedom récupère toutes les do: By default Jeedom retrieves all older data of 2 hours and makes 1 hour packets of it (either an average, a minimum or a maximum depending on the settings
history.md.On a donc ici deux paramètres, un pour l: So here we have two parameters, one for packet size and another to know when to do it (by default, these are 1 hour packets with data that are more than 2 hours old
history.md.Si vous avez bien suivi vous devriez avo: If you have followed well you should have a high precision on the last 2 hours only
history.md.Pourtant quand je me connecte à 17h, j'a: However when I connect at 5 p.m., I have a precision on the last 17 hours
history.md.En fait, pour éviter de consommer des re: In fact, to avoid consuming resources unnecessarily, the task of archiving takes place only once a day, in the evening
history.md.Bien sûr, ce principe d'archivage ne s'a: Of course, this archiving principle only applies to digital type commands; on binary type commands, Jeedom keeps only the dates of change of state
history.md.Il existe plusieurs moyens d'accéder à l: There are several ways to access the history
history.md.En cliquant sur la commande voulue dans: By clicking on the desired command in a widget
history.md.En allant dans la page historique qui pe: By going to the history page which allows to superimpose different curves and to combine styles (area, curve, bar

history.md.En mettant une zone graphe dans une vue: By putting a graph area in a view (see below

history.md.La période d'affichage, comprenant les d: The display period, including historical data between these two dates
history.md.Par défaut, en fonction du paramètre: By default, depending on the setting
history.md.Propose plusieurs options de groupement: Offers several grouping options (Sum per hour, etc
history.md.Option sauvegardée sur la commande et ut: Option saved on the order and used from the Dashboard
history.md.Affiche la différence de valeur par rapp: Displays the difference in value from the previous point
history.md.Permet d'afficher la courbe sous la form: Displays the curve as a staircase or a continuous display
history.md.Si vous affichez plusieurs courbes en mê: If you display several curves at the same time
history.md.Un clic sur une légende sous le graphiqu: Click on a legend below the graph to display / hide this curve
history.md.Ctrl Clic sur une légende vous permet de: Ctrl Click on a legend allows you to display only this one
history.md.Alt Clic sur une légende vous permet de: Alt Click on a legend allows you to display them all
history.md.Vous pouvez aussi afficher les graphique: You can also display the graphs on the views (we will see here the configuration options and not how to do it, for that you have to go to the documentation of the views or designs in function
history.md.Une fois une donnée activée, vous pouvez: Once a data is activated, you can choose
history.md.Le type de graphique (aire, ligne ou col: The type of graph (area, line or column
history.md.Vu que vous pouvez mettre plusieurs cour: Since you can put several curves (data) on the same graph, it is possible to distinguish the scales (right or left
history.md.Permet d'empiler les valeurs des courbes: Stack the values of the curves (see below for the result
history.md.La page d'historique donne accès à quelq: The history page gives access to some additional options
history.md.Permet d'afficher une courbe en fonction: Allows to display a curve according to a calculation on several commands (you can do almost anything, + - / \* absolute value ... see PHP documentation for some functions
history.md.Vous avez aussi accès à un gestion de fo: You also have access to a management of calculation formulas which allows you to save them for easier re-display
history.md.Il suffit de cliquer sur le nom de l'obj: Just click on the name of the object to unfold it, and bring up the historical commands that can be displayed
history.md.Devant chaque donnée pouvant être affich: In front of each data that can be displayed, you will find two icons
history.md.Permet de supprimer les données enregist: Allows you to delete the recorded data; when clicking, Jeedom asks whether to delete the data before a certain date or all the data
history.md.Permet d'avoir un export CSV des données: Enables CSV export of historical data
history.md.Parfois, il se peut que vous ayez des va: Sometimes you may have inconsistent values on the graphs
history.md.Cela est souvent dû à un souci d'interpr: This is often due to a concern with interpreting the value
history.md.Il est possible de supprimer ou changer: It is possible to delete or change the value of the point in question, by clicking on it directly on the graph; in addition, you can adjust the minimum and maximum allowed to avoid future problems

interact.md.d'exclusion, si une phrase générée corre: exclusion, if a generated sentence matches this Regexp it will be deleted
interact.md.L'intérêt c'est de pouvoir supprimer des: The interest is to be able to remove false positives, ie a sentence generated by Jeedom which activates something which does not correspond to what we want or which would interfere with another interaction which would have a similar sentence

interact.md.Généralement, on l'utilise pour effacer: Generally, it is used to erase incorrectly formed sentences found in most interactions generated

interact.md.Elle vous permet donc de supprimer plus: It therefore allows you to delete more precisely for an interaction
interact.md.Cela peut aussi permettre d'effacer une: It can also make it possible to delete an interaction for a specific command for which one does not want to offer this possibility within the framework of a generation of multiple commands
interact.md.La capture d'écran qui suit montre l'int: The following screenshot shows the interaction without the Regexp

interact.md.Comme vous pouvez le voir sur la capture: As you can see on the following screenshot, I added a simple regexp which will search for the word "Julie" in the generated sentences and delete them
interact.md.Toutefois, on peut voir dans la liste de: However, we can see in the list on the left that there are always sentences with the word "julie", in regular expressions, Julie is not equal to julie, this is called a case sensitivity or in good French a capital letter is different from a lowercase
interact.md.Comme on peut le voir dans la capture su: As we can see in the following screenshot, there are only 71 sentences left, the 5 with a "Julie" have been deleted
interact.md.Une expression régulière se compose comm: A regular expression is composed as follows
interact.md.En premier, un délimiteur, ici c'est une: First, a delimiter, here it is a slash "/" placed at the beginning and end of expression
interact.md.Le point qui suit la barre oblique repré: The dot after the slash represents any character, space or number
interact.md.Le \"\\*\" quant à lui indique qu'il peu: The "\*" indicates that there can be 0 or more times the character preceding it, here a point, so in good French any element
interact.md.Puis Julie, qui est le mot à rechercher: Then Julie, which is the word to look for (word or other expression pattern), followed by a dot again and a slash
interact.md.Si on traduit cette expression en une ph: If we translate this expression into a sentence, it would give "look for the word Julie which is preceded by anything and followed by anything
interact.md.C'est une version extrêmement simple des: It's an extremely simple version of regular expressions but already very complicated to understand

interact.md.Comme exemple un peu plus complexe, une: As a slightly more complex example, a regexp to verify a URL
